item.description:
Hi Ladies!

 

After really thinking about the ramifications of getting anywhere near route one this Sunday- I've decided to change the venue to the Charlie Horse in West Bridgewater.  It is supposed to GORGEOUS out on Sunday so we can sit outside on their covered porch to watch the game, or inside the air conditioned bar/restaurant.  For those that have never been- this place is tons of fun!  Lots of flat screens and good food and reasonably priced drinks.

 

Hope this works better for everyone??

 

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: As the date approaches- I will suggest a place to meet
item.name: CHANGE OF VENUE!!!! Moving location to Charlie Horse West Bridgewater
